text:
🤝Nanyang Business School is part of Nanyang Technological University (NTU) in Singapore. I visited this campus building to attend a specialized conference.

🏫🏫Nanyang Business school is quite popular in Singapore and has been nurturing leaders from around the world, employing innovative pedagogy that melds rigorous academic theory with real-world business practice

👨‍🏫👩‍🏫👨‍🏫👩‍🏫The school offers undergraduate and postgraduate education in business, including its flagship program, the Nanyang MBA. Nanyang Business School is committed to cultivating internationally competitive corporate leaders who are socially responsible and environmentally sustainable.

🤝🤝NTU's industry partnerships provide students with opportunities to learn from industry giants through internships at research labs set up on campus by NTU and big-name corporations.
The library here is one of the best for resources. Although can be a bit crowded at times. Highly recommended!
Grate school that gave far more practical experience compared to the UK business school I attended.
Awesome Faculties. Excellent Resource Base. Ample Facilities.
Really big and a good school.
